name: @monstermakes/larry-identity-angular
description: Angular module that provides user and authorization/authentication service based on auth0.

scripts.lint-fix: echo '=> Fixing Linting errors...' && ng lint --fix
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && echo '=> Releasing larry-identity-angular lib...' && npm run test
scripts.test: echo '=> Verifying...' && npm run lint && npm run test-coverage
scripts.test-coverage: echo '=> TODO Run cypress Tests w/ Coverage...'
scripts.clean-build: echo '=> Cleaning larry-identity-angular lib...' && rm -rf dist/larry-identity-angular
scripts.build-watch: echo '=> Building larry-identity-angular lib...' && npm run clean-build && ng build larry-identity-angular --watch
scripts.build: echo '=> Building larry-identity-angular lib...' && npm run clean-build && ng build larry-identity-angular
